attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is about time that this Government opened these child court cases like all other court rooms in the UK.Children or being taken off parents on the word of a social worker.parents have the right to have there case heard in a open court room with a jury ,and the courts can still protect the children involved from the public .Many children or being ripped apart from there familys far so many silly reasons,childrens fellings or not being taken into account.i call far this barbaric act to stop now

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
